mapper.sql: diagDefId, code, name, pinYin, enable, beid
mapper.insert:
insert into bas_diagnosedef
diagDefId,
code,
name,
pinYin,
enable,
beid,
#{diagDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

INSERT INTO `bas_diagnosedef` (`diagDefId`, `code`, `name`, `pinYin`, `enable`, `beid`) SELECT CONCAT(#{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},`diagDefId`) AS diagDefId, `code`, `name`, `pinYin`, `enable`, #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} FROM `bas_diagnosedef` WHERE beid = '102';
mapper.update:
update bas_diagnosedef
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER},
beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where diagDefId = #{diagDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update bas_diagnosedef set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pinYin = #{pinYin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable = #{enable,jdbcType=INTEGER}, beid = #{beid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where diagDefId = #{diagDefId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM bas_diagnosedef where 1=1 and beid = #{systemSearchFormBean.beid} ${filter}
select * from bas_diagnosedef where code = #{code} and beid = #{beid}
mapper.update: update bas_diagnosedef set enable='0' where beid = #{beid};
mapper.select: select * from bas_diagnosedef where name = #{name} and beid = #{beid}
select * from bas_diagnosedef order by CONVERT(diagDefId,SIGNED) DESC;
